About Me

Welcome! I'm Devin Halladay, designer and writer. I craft beautiful and honest visual solutions. I sincerely care about the stories with which I work and I have an ambition towards the finest of execution.

Colophon

This site is built using Jekyll, Sass, and ZURB Foundation. It is hosted by the wonderful folks at Media Temple. Type is set in Mercury and Whitney from Hoefler & Frere-Jones.
